resources.string:
√ Squash is a ball sport played by two (singles) or four players (doubles squash) in a four–walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.

√ Squash is played up to best of 5 games where scoring system consists of set of 11 points in each.

√ Whoever scores 11 points first and is 2 points clear of opponent wins the game and whoever, wins 3 games first, WINS the match.
e.g., If the scores are 10–10, the play is continued until one is two points clear of the opponent.

√ Winning a point gets the next serve, known as RALLY.

√ If the ball hits the floor more than once, then the player lose 1 point.

√ If the player doesn't gets out of the way of ball,the opponent gains 1 point.
